select count(user_id) from user_mst where user_id = #{signUpId}

select count(user_nickname) as result from user_mst
where user_nickname = #{signUpNickname};
mapper.insert: insert into user_mst values( #{user_id}, #{user_password}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone}, #{user_nickname}, 0, 0, #{role}, '', now(), now() )
mapper.select: select user_id,user_password,user_name, user_phone, user_nickname, buy_count, sell_count, role, provider, create_date, update_date from user_mst where user_id = #{user_id}
